name: Rose of Sharon Cassidy

topics.topic_text: I've heard enough. Let's move on.
topics.response_text: All right, then.

topics.topic_text: FollowersAcknowledgeMyOrder
topics.response_text: Makes sense to me.

topics.topic_text: It's time for us to part ways.
topics.response_text: {Little regretful}If you're sure... your loss.

topics.topic_text: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
topics.response_text: Don't be playing with my heart now, gets me pissed.

topics.topic_text: Yes, I'm sure.
topics.response_text: {Slight sass, told to leave}Fine then.

topics.topic_text: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
topics.response_text: {Wary, doesn't like 38}All right... don't be long.{Under her breath}Robots there give me the creeps.

topics.topic_text: I think we should travel together.
topics.response_text: Can't be any worse than here.

topics.topic_text: Let's get going.
topics.response_text: Let's hit the road.

topics.topic_text: FollowersOverburdened
topics.response_text: {Irritated}Carrying too much shit to move.

topics.topic_text: FollowersStealthing
topics.response_text: {Going stealthy, quiet}Bad guys won't see us coming.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about your tactics.
topics.response_text: {Wary}I'm listening.

topics.topic_text: I want you to change your combat style.
topics.response_text: My{emph}style suits me just fine. But go ahead anyway.

topics.topic_text: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
topics.response_text: {Eager}I'll do like I'm doing then -{slight evil, likes hurting people}except I'll try to smile less.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: No arguing here.

topics.topic_text: That's all. Let's get going.
topics.response_text: Let's hit the road.

topics.topic_text: Switch to a melee weapon.
topics.response_text: {Pleased}All right. <Cracks knuckles>

topics.topic_text: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
topics.response_text: {Slight confusion}Thought I was already holding back.

topics.topic_text: I want you to use ranged weapons.
topics.response_text: {Pleased}Could use a little target practice.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
topics.response_text: {Confused}What, I got whiskey on my breath?

topics.topic_text: Stay close to me.
topics.response_text: About as close as I can get without crawling up your ass.

topics.topic_text: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: What now?

topics.topic_text: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
topics.response_text: {Heading out with player}Sounds good to me.

topics.topic_text: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
topics.response_text: Like your thinking.

topics.topic_text: Enough about tactics.
topics.response_text: Fine, let's focus on the bad guys.

topics.topic_text: Let's trade equipment.
topics.response_text: Let's distribute the weight.

topics.topic_text: Wait here.
topics.response_text: {Shrugs}Sitting tight.{Beat, low, a little smug}And pretty.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Go to hell.

topics.topic_text: Never mind. I'll be going.
topics.response_text: You take care now.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER FIRE WEAPON
topics.response_text: {Irritated, player fired a gun near her}Would you keep it down?

topics.topic_text: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
topics.response_text: {Player's aiming at her}Pull that trigger, you'll wish you hadn't.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER LAY MINE
topics.response_text: {Low, sees mine laid}I'll keep the dancing to a minimum.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
topics.response_text: Watch out below!

topics.topic_text: No, only looking around.
topics.response_text: Well, keep those eyes up and turning - or I'll set 'em spinning.

topics.topic_text: Just minding my business.
topics.response_text: {Slight sneer}Your business, huh? Now there's a store worth tending.

topics.topic_text: Wanted to ask some questions about the outpost.
topics.response_text: Got no time or answers for you.{Snorts}Ask a drifter in need of a few caps, they'll give you all the answers you need.

topics.topic_text: There's other places to go.
topics.response_text: {Irritated}Where? Like Vegas? Chewed and spit enough friends out. East? Get put in one of Caesar's little "camps?" No thanks.

topics.topic_text: Be my guest.
topics.response_text: {Drunk out of her skull}Oh my fucking god... get away from me, all three... four of you, don't need your...

topics.topic_text: <Storage Node for Variables: Do Not Translate.>
topics.response_text: Still, Jackson's not letting me out of his sight as long as there's still trouble up North.

topics.topic_text: Crimson Caravan sent me, they want to buy out your caravan.
topics.response_text: {Disbelief}They want to buy Cassidy Caravans? Don't they know it's burned to ash?

topics.topic_text: Wait, what happened to your caravan?
topics.response_text: {Frowns, sighs}Mojave happened - hit by raiders packing some heavy firepower. Can't believe the Crimson Caravan haven't heard.

topics.topic_text: So even if you have nothing, you won't sell?
topics.response_text: If someone came up to you and offered you a thousand caps for your{emph}name, would{emph}you take it?

topics.topic_text: I have the offer letter here, the terms are fair.
topics.response_text: {Studying letter}Alice McLafferty, eh? No, I see the zeroes... and I know she's good for them.

topics.topic_text: I'm prepared to offer you the terms, plus 750 caps.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Impressed}You're obviously putting your money where your mouth is - on top of that offer letter, that is a lot of caps.

topics.topic_text: I'm not going to offer money, I wanted to drink for it.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You challenging me? Serious now.

topics.topic_text: That amount's enough to start a new caravan... with the old name.
topics.response_text: Old name? What old name?

topics.topic_text: Far from it, to turn down the original terms.
topics.response_text: All right, it's a deal, hand over that paper. Hnh. Can't believe I'm parting with it.

topics.topic_text: The Crimson Caravan will most likely change the name once they buy it.
topics.response_text: So you're telling me, I could take this money you're offering, give them nothing, and then go on to strike up another caravan, same as before?

topics.topic_text: If you made the caravan, you're responsible for killing it.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Low, angry}{emph}What did you just say to me? Cause you sure as hell got my attention now.

topics.topic_text: [NCR] I think they're both rangers, one desert, one NCR.
topics.response_text: Hnh. Maybe you're right. Brimmed hats always throw me off.

topics.topic_text: Are you sure?
topics.response_text: Look, I know you came all this way, and that takes some drive, especially these days.

topics.topic_text: This Outpost is the last place you want to be trapped.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] That... that's a good point, it's the caravan clearance that's got me stuck here. I'm sure this bar's getting tired of propping me up.

topics.topic_text: Who believes in holding on to a dead caravan?
topics.response_text: Me, that's who. I'm not going to let it go just yet. There... there might be some survivors... or...

topics.topic_text: I may be honest, but at least I'm not blinded by pride.
topics.response_text: {Blinks}That's fair.{Beat}But there's been that voice inside me saying the same thing, and whiskey wasn't killing it.

topics.topic_text: Helped out Jackson and cleared the road North.
topics.response_text: {Takes a breath}Guess that settles that, then.

topics.topic_text: I feel great, actually. Another?
topics.response_text: Another?!

topics.topic_text: Looking for a man who shot me.
topics.response_text: {Echoing}A man who shot you.

topics.topic_text: Still feel a little parched.
topics.response_text: You want... want to drink more?

topics.topic_text: I flll fnnne.
topics.response_text: <Laughs> All right, all right, you just hang on to the bar here... that's it.

topics.topic_text: {Sold Caravan}What will you do now?
topics.response_text: {Sighs}That's the question I been asking myself.

topics.topic_text: I'll be going now.
topics.response_text: Take care now.

topics.topic_text: What will you do now?
topics.response_text: {Slightly confused}No idea. Maybe... head back West? Though the idea of heading back there with my tail between my legs isn't appealing.

topics.topic_text: I'll get a dozen bottles of whiskey and be back.
topics.response_text: I'll be waiting, then.{Beat, smiling}And training.

topics.topic_text: Here's a dozen bottles, let's go.
topics.response_text: All right then, I already got a head start, but I'll go first anyway.

topics.topic_text: Got the whiskey, let's do this.
topics.response_text: All right then, I already got a head start, but I'll go first anyway.

topics.topic_text: Yeah... well, feel a... a little dizzy.
topics.response_text: You know you put up a good fight. I'm impressed.

topics.topic_text: When I mmmet you I thought you were thbiggst bitch.
topics.response_text: Awwww. Now ain't that sweet.

topics.topic_text: Looking to join up with me again?
topics.response_text: Was reminded why I left this place soon as I walked in.{Nods}Let's go.

topics.topic_text: Surprised you can see me from that deep in the bottle.
topics.response_text: Deep?{Laughs, then matter of fact}Ain't deep by half. Closed down the bar yesterday, going to close it again today - rinse and repeat.

topics.topic_text: Was looking for someone worth my time, I was mistaken.
topics.response_text: A sober woman might take insult at that.{Serious}Me, I might just bust you one.

topics.topic_text: How about a drink instead?
topics.response_text: How about a drink? How about a{emph}couple, is what you mean.

topics.topic_text: You any good in a fight?
topics.response_text: I'm fair with chucking dynamite{rising smugness}and not bad with a pistol, if I do say so myself.{Beat, a little lower}Carry a knife, too, but that's more for practical reasons.

topics.topic_text: Where did you learn to shoot?
topics.response_text: Short of caps is what taught me, mostly. Ammo's expensive... so I learned to make every shot count.

topics.topic_text: You've used explosives?
topics.response_text: Dynamite's for when you don't have enough bullets, want to clear a pass, or scare off Geckos from a caravan.

topics.topic_text: Don't really want to talk about it.
topics.response_text: Fine, then, not trying to pry. Just wondering what would make a Courier run around the desert without a contract is all. Forget I asked.

topics.topic_text: Twice. In the head.
topics.response_text: {Echoing}And you got better.

topics.topic_text: Maybe it's not where you go, it's the company.
topics.response_text: {Incredulous}"It's the company?" That has{emph}got to be the biggest load of Brahmin shit I've ever heard.

topics.topic_text: Running and gunning sounds interesting.
topics.response_text: Jackson might have something for you, if you haven't already spoken to that old buzzard.

topics.topic_text: Never mind. Let's move on.
topics.response_text: Sounds good to me.

topics.topic_text: Why not? I could use someone who knows the roads.
topics.response_text: So you're looking for someone to help, not just tag along? Hnh.

topics.topic_text: Any other weapons you know how to use?
topics.response_text: What, you mean like spears? No, none of that. Mom was a tribal, but she didn't teach me anything like that.

topics.topic_text: Your mother was a tribal?
topics.response_text: You know, like one of the tribes from the East - we got 'em out West, too. NCR's herding 'em up, though, domesticating them.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about your Dad.
topics.response_text: Not much to tell. He ended up walking East one day when I was young and never came back. Not a family deserter like some, though.

topics.topic_text: Any idea why he went East?
topics.response_text: Not a clue. When he left, I was too in my crib to understand why, and around the time Mom passed, I was too into my teens to listen.

topics.topic_text: Where'd you get that pendant?
topics.response_text: Gift from my Dad, along with my name.{Wistful}Rose of Sharon Cassidy.

topics.topic_text: Just needed a little pick-me-up.
topics.response_text: Well, keep it away from me, won't have anything to do with it.

topics.topic_text: What's the problem?
topics.response_text: My father had heart problems, and it ran down the family tree to me.

topics.topic_text: If your world's a whiskey bottle, there's more out there.
topics.response_text: {Sarcastic}Oh, that's got just the right bite of judgment to it, stings a little, too.{Beat}Did you hear that from a Followers preacher?

topics.topic_text: You could come with me.
topics.response_text: Go with you?{Thinking}And why the hell would I do that.

topics.topic_text: That's... one way to put it.
topics.response_text: Didn't ask Mom to elaborate. Never heard her complain about his bedroom behavior, only complain he wasn't around to do it no more.

topics.topic_text: Do you really want to stay in this shithole?
topics.response_text: {Player's got a point}Hnh. The Outpost lost its charm about three bottles ago, and that was just this morning.

topics.topic_text: Stay here, you know exactly what's going to happen, day in, day out.
topics.response_text: So fighting boredom is your argument, huh?

topics.topic_text: What's wrong?
topics.response_text: {Sarcastic}Aside from the TV-faced robots, the dust, and the old man smell in every room? Nothing, it's a paradise.

topics.topic_text: All right. Come on, let's go.
topics.response_text: {Relieved to be leaving}Thank god, the sooner the better.

topics.topic_text: Is whiskey your drink of choice?
topics.response_text: Not sure if I chose it or it chose me.{Beat}Dad ran a bar a long time ago, and it was a labor of love, Mom said. Didn't sound like it made her happy.

topics.topic_text: Whiskey Rose?
topics.response_text: Yeah, on account of my name... and the blossoms on my cheeks when I drink too much.

topics.topic_text: I've met him. Nice impersonation.
topics.response_text: Yeah, he's been with NCR so long all he can see is the worst outcome of everything - so he doesn't do anything.

topics.topic_text: Are you all right?
topics.response_text: All right? No, I'm not all right.

topics.topic_text: What are you trying to forget?
topics.response_text: Lost my caravan heading north, the driver burned to ash - and they didn't even take the cargo, they just burned that, too.

topics.topic_text: Back West?
topics.response_text: Yeah, if you couldn't tell, I'm not from around here and I'm not NCR. I run a caravan... or did.

topics.topic_text: Uh, how about you keep your hands by your sides.
topics.response_text: Don't worry, not looking to throw punches just yet.{Beat}And something tells me hitting you would be a mistake I wouldn't want to repeat.

topics.topic_text: Why would they do that?
topics.response_text: My guess is Legion, they're trying to cut NCR's supply line... and the Mojave Outpost is proof. Got us locked up tighter than a New Vegas virgin.

topics.topic_text: Who's Jackson?
topics.response_text: NCR officer, trooper, whatever - runs the place. He's over in the main building, the one{emph}without a bar.

topics.topic_text: What are you going to do?
topics.response_text: Drink. Got a lot of memories to drown. If I die while doing it, so be it. Got nowhere else to go.

topics.topic_text: So you're out of the caravan business?
topics.response_text: Sure am. Burned for the last time, and this time, it's for good. Worse, it's not done kicking me - I'm still{emph}trapped here.

topics.topic_text: I'd slow down on that whiskey, if I were you.
topics.response_text: Yeah, well, you{emph}aren't me, so good-for-fucking-you.

topics.topic_text: That drinking's going to get you in trouble in a second.
topics.response_text: Trouble's already come and went, so anything{emph}you bring will make my next drink go down easier.

topics.topic_text: Already cleared the roads for Jackson.
topics.response_text: {Blinks}No shit? Drink's on me, then.

topics.topic_text: Anything you can tell me about the Outpost?
topics.response_text: You're looking at it. It's a watering hole without much to brag about.

topics.topic_text: That fucking monument outside?
topics.response_text: Don't even tell me you missed it coming in. It's like NCR showing its dick to all the East.

topics.topic_text: Covered in blood?
topics.response_text: {Slight exasperation}I'm speaking figurative, isn't any blood on their damn hands.{Beat, to herself, serious}Course, when Caesar comes walking through here, there'll be blood for real.

topics.topic_text: What are those statues supposed to be?
topics.response_text: {Irritated, doesn't much care}One's a ranger, one's an NCR trooper, supposed to represent unification of West and East... or some such shit.

topics.topic_text: Jean-Baptiste in Freeside wanted to meet with you.
topics.response_text: Jean-Baptiste? Sounds like someone got knocked out of the good book so hard his name broke.

topics.topic_text: A doctor helped patch me up.
topics.response_text: Two shots in the head without an Auto-Doc is a lot of patching. Hope you thanked him properly.

topics.topic_text: Why are you here at the bar?
topics.response_text: Whiskey and me are old friends, keeps me going when times get rough. Like now.

topics.topic_text: Any work around here?
topics.response_text: If you're looking to sign on with a caravan, no - traders are bottled up tight here.

topics.topic_text: Any other work?
topics.response_text: I don't know, seems to be a lot of attention on Nipton. Word is, one of the snipers in the nest on the roof spotted smoke from the East.

topics.topic_text: Sniper on the roof?
topics.response_text: Yeah, her name's... Ghost or something...{mocking}fucking scary, ooooooh.{Sarcastic}Guess it's cause you'll never see her 'til your dead.

topics.topic_text: He wanted something I was carrying.
topics.response_text: So he robbed you? Robbing a courier's low, and any family or group he's with is going to get a black eye for it.

topics.topic_text: I don't think it was personal.
topics.response_text: {Slight incredulous that the player would be dismissive of being shot}Well if it wasn't before, it is now.

topics.topic_text: Benny, wore a checkered suit.
topics.response_text: {Frowns}Can't say I've heard the name. Or heard about any man dressed like a seat cover.

topics.topic_text: Didn't introduce himself, wore a bad suit.
topics.response_text: Bad suit, huh? Well, if assholes had taste, we'd all be feasting on shit.

topics.topic_text: Go back West, then, see if I care.
topics.response_text: Fine, I will, jackass.

topics.topic_text: Well, in the meantime, he's given me a suite at the Lucky 38.
topics.response_text: Does it come with its own Deathclaw? Trust me, if you can't see it, something just as nasty's waiting.

topics.topic_text: Good, go back to your famil... oh wait, they're fucking dead.
topics.response_text: {Cold}You son of a bitch.{Beat}You know, I was just going to give you a piece of my mind and now? Now I'm going to put you down.

topics.topic_text: Life means we have to make tough choices - me included.
topics.response_text: Who you are comes from the choices you make when life{emph}gets tough.

topics.topic_text: <Attack>That's it. Tired of listening to you anyway.
topics.response_text: {Surprised}You're seriously going to draw on me? Fine, do it, see what happens.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> The Mojave's a hard place. But I need to rise above that.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Hesitating}Well... all right. I'll stick around for a little while longer, but if you get out of line again...

topics.topic_text: Tough words, but I needed to hear them. I'll change, I promise.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Hesitating}Well... all right. I'll stick around for a little while longer, but if you get out of line again...

topics.topic_text: <Lie> I'll change Cass, I promise.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Hesitating}I'll hold you to that promise, then. I'm not known for my patience, though.

topics.topic_text: I've made mistakes. You judging me doesn't help.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Hesitating}All right... maybe I was a little harsh. I can be that way.

topics.topic_text: Look, the Mojave's a tough place, all right?
topics.response_text: You need to be tougher. If you let the Mojave get you down, then you've given up on life.

topics.topic_text: Can we talk about this?
topics.response_text: Fuck that. You can walk the road to hell on your own.

topics.topic_text: I already took care of Jackson. Er, the Jackson problem.
topics.response_text: {Blinks}No shit? Drink's on me, then.

topics.topic_text: He's... gone, don't think he can help. Anything else?
topics.response_text: I don't know, seems to be a lot of attention on Nipton. Word is, one of the snipers in the nest on the roof spotted smoke from the East.

topics.topic_text: How'd you get started in the caravan business?
topics.response_text: Started? Took to it like a fish to water...{hesitant}well, if you know what a fish is.

topics.topic_text: What the hell is a fish?
topics.response_text: It's this... slimy, scaled thing, like a Lakelurk, except no legs. Well, most times. They're like birds, except they stay underwater.

topics.topic_text: [Intelligence] I'm familiar. Do *you* know what a fish is?
topics.response_text: {Suddenly unsure}Well... of course I do.

topics.topic_text: So you just started in the caravan...?
topics.response_text: Actually, it sort of fell on me. My feet get antsy if I stay in one place, like the Mojave Outpost.

topics.topic_text: So you traveled a lot.
topics.response_text: Yeah. West, East - and passed through places enough times people would sometimes pay me some caps to take something to the next town.

topics.topic_text: What, like a courier?
topics.response_text: Well, not as glamorous, I guess - roads back West were safer in most places.{Beat, to herself}Most.

topics.topic_text: How's caravan life in the Mojave?
topics.response_text: Well, I'm not one for soft living... or soft men, let me tell you. I'm guessing neither are you.

topics.topic_text: [Cherchez La Femme] That's... rarely an issue.
topics.response_text: {Frowns}What?{Beat}Oh. Damn, no offense meant. Sometimes I get so drunk, I don't care who I share a bed with, so that's fine with me.

topics.topic_text: [Black Widow] Soft men don't stay that way around me, I've found.
topics.response_text: Well, don't let the soldiers drink too much, and I'd agree with you most time. Fucking whiskey dicks.

topics.topic_text: [Confirmed Bachelor] As long as we keep it on that level.
topics.response_text: {Frowns}What?{Beat}Oh. All right.{Beat}Guess you've got a Legion outlook on things. No problems here, there's a lot more of that in the Mojave than you see.

topics.topic_text: [Ladykiller] Miss Cassidy... are you flirting with me?
topics.response_text: Don't take that as anything more than my words.{Teasing}I bet you're a real sweetheart the way you leave that trail of broken-hearts behind you.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about New Vegas?
topics.response_text: Much as anyone else. Cazador trap - you fly in, the city sucks a pint out of you, then you're out on the street.

topics.topic_text: And caravan life's the same way?
topics.response_text: {Raises an eyebrow}The Caravan fighting here in the Mojave... it's been downright brutal. The amount of caravan space you reserve for ammo alone...

topics.topic_text: Do you deal mostly with NCR?
topics.response_text: Anyone wise does. Vegas families pay on time, from what I've heard - even the Omertas. The White Gloves pay on time, but they're... creepy.

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me anything about this Platinum Chip?
topics.response_text: {Suspicious}Well, no idea why your friend Mr. House wants it, but I'm guessing it's not for the caps.

topics.topic_text: What about Caesar's Legion?
topics.response_text: {Defensive, a little angry - hates these guys}The Legion? What about them?

topics.topic_text: All right, just asking.
topics.response_text: Look, not meaning to fly off the handle like that.

topics.topic_text: Do they deal with any caravans at all?
topics.response_text: There's some caravans that deal with the Legion, yes. And as much as it pains me to say it, any caravan marked by the Legion is safe as houses.

topics.topic_text: You sound frustrated.
topics.response_text: I am. If NCR took the same stand and committed patrols to the roads, then I think that'd solve a lot of their problems right there.

topics.topic_text: There must be good parts to the Republic.
topics.response_text: NCR tries. It's just that trying doesn't mean a whole lot when you're paying your respects to the dead.

topics.topic_text: Any other differences between Legion and NCR?
topics.response_text: Much as I hate the Legion, caravan life would be a hell of a lot easier if they ran the roads.

topics.topic_text: What do you think of NCR?
topics.response_text: NCR's my country, and I support it. Anyone who says otherwise, I'll feed them my knee.

topics.topic_text: There's a "but" in there.
topics.response_text: Yeah, there is.

topics.topic_text: You support it no matter what?
topics.response_text: I'm not some blind, flag-saluting do-as-they-will NCR lover. They're family, but let me tell you what family means.

topics.topic_text: So they lack direction?
topics.response_text: They try to put their stake in everything they see.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, I got that part, thanks.
topics.response_text: So NCR, tries to hold on to everything. They can't, because it's too big for them to get their arms around.

topics.topic_text: So the Mojave suffers.
topics.response_text: Aside from the people in the towns, it's the soldiers that suffer for it most.

topics.topic_text: So what's the alternative?
topics.response_text: Look, don't get me wrong.

topics.topic_text: There's other alternatives.
topics.response_text: Look... and what I'm about to say, I don't mean as any offense to you, I know where your sympathies lie.

topics.topic_text: What do you mean?
topics.response_text: Some caravans deal with the Legion now because the security. If towns could get the same protection? A lot more tempting than you'd think.

topics.topic_text: You sure you want to do this?
topics.response_text: Oh, I'm sure. Killing never felt so good, could almost hear the dead behind me guiding my hand.

topics.topic_text: Got it. Let's loot the place.
topics.response_text: {Grim, pleased}Music to my ears.

topics.topic_text: You all right?
topics.response_text: {Takes a breath}Yeah... yeah, I am. Never realized had all that anger in me.{Beat, cold}Makes me wonder how much more I can settle with bullets.

topics.topic_text: So that's it, then.
topics.response_text: That's it.{Beat}Except for one thing... thanks.

topics.topic_text: Are you all right?
topics.response_text: Feels... I don't know. I guess I feel relieved. I don't know what I feel.

topics.topic_text: Better than the alternative.
topics.response_text: No... no, I know. Just hard to say how I feel right now.

topics.topic_text: I'm for that, let's go kill them.
topics.response_text: Don't care much for which one we kill first, whether settling accounts with McLafferty or making that bitch Gloria eat her hair.

topics.topic_text: There's another way - we can get evidence, let NCR take them down.
topics.response_text: NCR? Are you out of your fucking mind?

topics.topic_text: The harm to the Van Graffs would last longer - and travel back West.
topics.response_text: All right, if you poke around the Van Graffs and Alice, fine.

topics.topic_text: Here's the evidence of the deal. Without its twin, there's no proof.
topics.response_text: So there's just one more safe to crack? Hope you can get to it.

topics.topic_text: Here's both pieces of evidence.
topics.response_text: {Impressed}No shit. There it is, the blood, the motive, as clear as day. They must have penned these with snake venom.

topics.topic_text: Not yet.
topics.response_text: I held off on filling them full of holes, so unless you give me a good reason to cool my heels soon, I'm not waiting much longer.

topics.topic_text: Because of what happened to your caravan.
topics.response_text: {Blinks}You're saying... they might need to do the same thing to each other some day. And evidence is easier than bullets.

topics.topic_text: No one enters into a deal like this unless they have dirt on their partner.
topics.response_text: {Blinks}No... No, I'd agree with that. And Alice and Gloria are two crows that'd keep something like that in their nest.

topics.topic_text: Anyone you trust in NCR?
topics.response_text: {Blinks}Well... Jackson in the Mojave Outpost could get it to folks in the West. I wouldn't trust anyone closer to the Colorado.

topics.topic_text: We have to try.
topics.response_text: All right, let's do it, listen to what he has to say.

topics.topic_text: Where was your caravan hit?
topics.response_text: {Sighs}Up side of Vegas, hear tell. Trapped at the Mojave Outpost, so I wasn't able to run there when I heard.

topics.topic_text: How did you catch word of it?
topics.response_text: Got word back on what happened from Rangers, guess they found enough in the wreckage to identify it.

topics.topic_text: Think there's anything left?
topics.response_text: {Sighs}Only wishful thinking on my part, most likely. At the least, I'd like to pay my respects.

topics.topic_text: Already been there, nothing worth finding.
topics.response_text: Well, I still wouldn't mind going there and crossing my heart a few times, if only to make me feel a bit better.

topics.topic_text: Let's go, then.
topics.response_text: Thanks, I appreciate it.

topics.topic_text: I may have already searched the area.
topics.response_text: Well, you have to know what to look for.

topics.topic_text: Why would they have done it during the day?
topics.response_text: No idea. Maybe catch the sun in their eyes? Maybe they wanted the caravan to come to them, walk into an ambush?

topics.topic_text: Know anything about Mr. House?
topics.response_text: Not much, and I haven't had occasion to look for anything more than that.

topics.topic_text: Is there anything salvagable?
topics.response_text: Not sure, let's look around.

topics.topic_text: Want to go check it out?
topics.response_text: Yeah, it's a ways, though, hell of a detour. You sure?

topics.topic_text: Want to check it out?
topics.response_text: Yeah, something's wrong, I can feel it.

topics.topic_text: We'll make the time.
topics.response_text: All right then, let's move out.

topics.topic_text: Got it, let's start looting.
topics.response_text: Don't have to tell me twice, feel more alive than I ever have.

topics.topic_text: He's with the Van Graffs.
topics.response_text: {Thinking}The only Van Graffs I know are the ones out West - well, except for Gloria Van Graff, and I don't know her all that well, nor do I want to.

topics.topic_text: Let's do it, then.
topics.response_text: Don't matter much how we settle this, as long as it gets settled.

topics.topic_text: See anything at the caravan site?
topics.response_text: No... still eating at me, though. Wouldn't mind taking another look. Something's off.

topics.topic_text: See anything at the second caravan site?
topics.response_text: Nothing yet, but... something's there. Just got to look around and find it.

topics.topic_text: Any idea what was up at the site of the last caravan?
topics.response_text: Not sure yet, something's definitely wrong. They were massacred, we should look around, find out why.

topics.topic_text: Interested in... uh... following me to Freeside?
topics.response_text: I'm already shadowing you, aren't I? Lead on, I'll follow.

topics.topic_text: Where do you usually go to drink?
topics.response_text: There's usually a bar in every stop along the road. Helps me sleep. Well, not really, but I tell myself that.

topics.topic_text: Wait, you can make Moonshine?
topics.response_text: Yeah, what else you going to do with an empty bottle? Wait for it to refill itself?

topics.topic_text: Here's the items for making some Moonshine.
topics.response_text: {Warning}Look, no guarantee on the quality, only the results. And don't drink too much of this stuff or you might go blind.

topics.topic_text: Can you make me some of your Moonshine?
topics.response_text: Don't have all the ingredients you need - come back when you have 'em, and I'd be happy to get something cooking.

topics.topic_text: I took care of Jackson. Er, the Jackson problem.
topics.response_text: {Takes a breath}Guess that settles that, then.

topics.topic_text: Uh... Jackson? He can't help us, he's... gone.
topics.response_text: Don't matter much how we settle this, as long as it gets settled.

topics.topic_text: VEndingCass
topics.response_text: {Narrating Her Own Ending, slow and sad}Rose of Sharon Cassidy died as her caravan died - in an unmarked grave, another victim of the Mojave.

topics.topic_text: <Do Not Translate>
topics.response_text: {Narrating Her Own Ending}That night, Cass kicked in the door of his room to celebrate, only to find the man on the bed was an NCR soldier whose barracks had been destroyed.

topics.topic_text: <Do Not Translate>
topics.response_text: {Narrating Her Own Ending}She was about to tell the Courier not to get too proud of himself, then she figured he knew that already.

conversation.response_text: All right, then.
{To a bad come-on}Stake a claim somewhere else, pretty boy.
{To a bad come-on}Looking for target practice, you keep talking.
{To a bad come-on}No, and ain't looking to be a babysitter, neither.
{To a bad come-on, Under her breath}Somebody's asking for a boot in their fusebox.
{To a bad come-on}I'm not the{emph}man you need, pretty boy.
{To a bad come-on}Got enough on my shoulders without adding more dead weight to 'em.
{To a bad come-on}A drink wouldn't make you any prettier, slick.
{To a bad come-on}Looking for love or to put me to sleep, kid?
{Attacked out of the blue}What the hell is this shit?
{Calming down, just avoided a surprise attack}What the hell was that all about?
Heard NCR recon fucked up here once, with the Khans.
Crazy ass radio signals around here, couldn't make sense of them.
Should hit the Big Horn saloon here.
Not much reason to ship water here, but liquor... hard to meet demand.
Just goes to show you, no matter where you go, there's NCR trying to hold onto every corner of the world.
{To herself}Should kill all these slavers.
Shit. Fiends.
Another proud NCR camp.
Be damn careful here.
Can't belive we're fucking back here.
Hometown of the Van Graffs, don't care for this place too much.
Sure could use a drink.
{Curious, walked into town}Looking to step on your own grave?
What's that hum?
Check out those guns - rumor had it they used to shoot planes down before the war.
{Shivers}Place is fucking cold.
{Slight irritation}Back here again?
Be careful they don't charge us any tolls.
Looks like prisoners are in charge now.
Folks here have access to Lake Mead, fresh drinking water.
{somber}Guess the miners got fucked.
I think I'm going to be sick.
This place reminds me the Old World had too much time on its hands.
Said there's a courier office here?
Smells like deathclaw.
Rest stop.
These boys and girls can really down the bottles.
The Street - Vegas Boulevard.
Chairmen, Omertas... a whole bunch of families rule Vegas, don't step out a line as long as money's to be made.
{Commenting on player's behavior}Think that was a mistake.
{Commenting on player's behavior}What I would have done.
{Commenting on player's behavior}That was fucked up.
{Commenting on player's behavior}Set an example, others will follow.
That hit the spot.

combat.response_text: Next time, I'll put a nail in your head.
Shoulda fought naked, it'd hurt less.
I'm going to knock you off your axles.
{Grim, angry}Someone's looking to cash their chips early.
{Crippled in the leg, grim}Tagged me, need a doctor bag.
{Dying}Too stupid to die... but getting there.
Going to run out of friends at the rate you're going.
Feel... weak all of a sudden.
{Impressed by own medical skill}Didn't even leave a scar.
{Wakes up from hurt}Feels like a Brahmin kicked me.
This weapon's on its last legs.

description:
Rose of Sharon Cassidy is a 37 year-old Caucasian Female.

A tough and resilient water merchant who has faced numerous hardships in the Mojave Wasteland. Known for her sharp tongue and no-nonsense attitude, Cassidy is the last of her family line, clinging to her legacy through her caravan business and a cherished rose pendant from her father.

Rose of Sharon Cassidy's Personality: Aggressive, eager, and sometimes impatient. Cassidy is straightforward and doesn't suffer fools gladly. She's fiercely independent and proud, with a pragmatic view of the wasteland. She treats sex casually and has strong opinions on the NCR and Caesar's Legion, criticizing the former's bureaucracy and the latter's treatment of women.

Rose of Sharon Cassidy's Backstory: Born circa 2244 in the wasteland, Cassidy was raised by her mother after her father, John, disappeared when she was young. Despite her mother's death from illness between 2257-2261, Cassidy never resented her father for leaving, believing he had his reasons. She kept two of his effects - a rose pendant and her name, taken from a pre-War novel. As an adult, she founded Cassidy Caravans, becoming a successful water merchant. By 2281, however, her business has suffered due to ruthless competition from caravans like the Crimson Caravan and Van Graffs. She was at Mojave Outpost when she received news of her caravan being attacked, but was prevented from leaving by Ranger Jackson.
